data.name: Zombie Night Terror - Soundtrack/Special Edition Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
The Zombie Night Terror Original Digital Soundtrack includes every spine-tingling track from the game. As a bonus, those who buy the Soundtrack will also get a pack of wallpapers specially themed around the game with their purchase.
